video.title: Skins
video.synopsis: This incisive series centers on the tense lives of a group of teenagers as the friends and wannabe lovers weather their final two years of school.

episodes.synopsis: Tony wants to have his best friend, Sid, lose his virginity -- and also make a profit. But things don't go exactly as planned.
episodes.title: Tony

episodes.synopsis: Cassie believes she can fool everyone into thinking she's overcoming her eating disorder, and finds refuge in Sid, who likes someone else.
episodes.title: Cassie

episodes.synopsis: Jal has reached the finals of Young Musician of the Year, but her father seems more concerned about his pretty, younger girlfriend.
episodes.title: Jal

episodes.synopsis: Chris' mom disappears, leaving him a small sum of money. But he must soon come to terms with the fact that his mom may never return.
episodes.title: Chris

episodes.synopsis: Sid has a week to brush up for history class if he doesn't want to fail. On top of it all, he's as sexually frustrated as ever.
episodes.title: Sid

episodes.synopsis: Tensions rise when a school trip to Russia forces the group to live in close quarters. Anwar falls for a Russian girl.
episodes.title: Maxxie and Anwar

episodes.synopsis: After breaking up with Tony and going on a date with a boy named Josh, things are starting to look up for Michelle.
episodes.title: Michelle

episodes.synopsis: Tony's sister, Effy, never utters a word and sneaks out at night to party. When she goes missing, Tony is desperate to find her.
episodes.title: Effy

episodes.synopsis: Anwar must come to terms with his family's religion and Maxxie's sexuality. Sid realized his love for Cassie and races to find her.
episodes.title: Everyone

episodes.synopsis: It's been six months since Tony's accident, and he's still recovering from the injury. Meanwhile, Maxxie wants to leave college and become a dancer.
episodes.title: Tony and Maxxie

episodes.synopsis: Sketch is a loner who spends her time locked up in her house taking care of her disabled mom. She's in love with Maxxie and jealous of Michelle.
episodes.title: Sketch

episodes.synopsis: Sid hasn't coped well with the fact that Tony isn't who he used to be. Soon Sid is hit with a life crisis that leaves him needing Tony more than ever.
episodes.title: Sid

episodes.synopsis: Michelle's mom has married yet another new husband. When a stepsister enters the picture, Michelle finds herself growing increasingly isolated.
episodes.title: Michelle

episodes.synopsis: Chris gets expelled from school and is forced to find a job. Jal and Chris strike up a deal: She'll unwind as long as he gets his act together.
episodes.title: Chris

episodes.synopsis: When Tony sees Sid and Michelle at a club, he can't control his emotions. Nobody understands what he's going through -- until he meets a strange girl.
episodes.title: Tony

episodes.synopsis: Effy takes care of her depressed mom, tries to restore the relationship between Tony and Michelle, and mentors the new girl at school.
episodes.title: Effy

episodes.synopsis: Jal's got a big secret that she can't tell anyone until she decides what to do about it. But she can't keep the secret for much longer.
episodes.title: Jal

episodes.synopsis: When a dinner party leads to a confrontation between Cassie and Michelle, the lies and secrets become too much for Cassie to handle.
episodes.title: Cassie

episodes.synopsis: It's the day of final report cards, and the friends decide not to look at their grades until they've said goodbye to Chris.
episodes.title: Final Goodbyes

episodes.synopsis: It's the first day of the new term at Roundview College and time to meet a brand-new set of 16-year-olds.
episodes.title: Everyone

episodes.synopsis: It's Cook's 17th birthday. Half the college has been invited to his Uncle Keith's pub to witness a night Cook believes will go down in history.
episodes.title: Cook

episodes.synopsis: Thomas arrives in England from Congo. His family is due to join him in a few days, and he must find somewhere for them to live.
episodes.title: Thomas

episodes.synopsis: Pandora persuades Effy to come to her sleepover, even though Effy is focused on getting messed up. Pandora confesses she needs advice on sex matters.
episodes.title: Pandora

episodes.synopsis: Freddie is emotionally blackmailed into upholding the story his sister and their dad are spinning about their dead mother for a TV talent show.
episodes.title: Freddie

episodes.synopsis: Naomi is controlling Emily's affections, dismissing Cook as a misogynist pig, and enjoying the flattering attention of her politics teacher.
episodes.title: Naomi

episodes.synopsis: Everything's gone pear-shaped since Effy came between JJ's two friends. JJ attempts to map out the problem in a flow chart, but it only maddens him.
episodes.title: J.J.

episodes.synopsis: Effy's lost her mojo. She resolves to confront her feelings for Freddie but finds him ensconced with someone else.
episodes.title: Effy

episodes.synopsis: Katie is too humiliated from the incident in the woods to leave the house. Luckily, she's got Emily to bail her out.
episodes.title: Katie and Emily

episodes.synopsis: Outlaws Cook and Effy are running wild, clinging to each other and blocking out the rest of the world by getting totally off their faces.
episodes.title: Finale

episodes.synopsis: Back from summer break, the gang gets absorbed in their hedonism. Then Thomas experiences a life-changing event that leads him to question everything.
episodes.title: Thomas

episodes.synopsis: Emily and Naomi are loved up and enjoying their extended summer of love together. The thorn in Emily's side is her family.
episodes.title: Emily

episodes.synopsis: Cook is in prison. After beating someone up in front of a room full of witnesses, he's told by his lawyer that he has no choice but to plead guilty.
episodes.title: Cook

episodes.synopsis: Katie's family's bankrupt, and they've got nowhere to live. And under the strain of it all, Jenna and Rob seem to be headed for splitsville.
episodes.title: Katie

episodes.synopsis: Freddie is loved up. Completely. He and Effy are enjoying their time together and carrying on their hedonistic ways with no thought of tomorrow.
episodes.title: Freddie

episodes.synopsis: JJ is in love. Lara Lloyd is sweet perfection, and he's smitten. But JJ thinks she's way out of his league and lacks the courage to ask her out.
episodes.title: JJ

episodes.synopsis: Effy has been in a psychiatric hospital since she tried to take her own life. After lots of therapy, her counselor says she is ready to go back home.
episodes.title: Effy

episodes.synopsis: The gang thinks about their past and future: Thomas is running fast, Katie is matchmaking, Cookie's up to his old tricks and Naomi's had enough.
episodes.title: Everyone

episodes.synopsis: Loner Franky accidentally challenges Mini's position as Queen Bee. Mini plays the long game and Franky finds herself befriended by the girls.
episodes.title: Franky

episodes.synopsis: Rich uses his extreme music to keep the world, especially girls, at bay. When Alo finds Rich's perfect woman, Rich must learn how to chat up girls.
episodes.title: Rich

episodes.synopsis: Mini is threatened. When Grace brings Franky into the Charity Fashion Show, Mini sacks them both and re-imagines the show in her own image.
episodes.title: Mini

episodes.synopsis: Liv continues to sleep with Nick, unsure why. She meets a boy named Matty, and they take a day out of reality with no consequences or commitments.
episodes.title: Liv

episodes.synopsis: Nick is star of the school -- he's hot, he's a rugby hero, and he's got the perfect arm candy in Mini. But Matty's reappearance has unsettled Nick.
episodes.title: Nick

episodes.synopsis: The sins of the city call to Alo, who's out partying in his continuous attempts to get laid. But his parents are fed up with having a useless son.
episodes.title: Alo

episodes.synopsis: Grace has always believed in fairy tales, but she is forced to face reality. When Rich learns her father's identity, Grace has some explaining to do.
episodes.title: Grace

episodes.synopsis: It's the day of Rich and Grace's wedding, and the fractured gang try and make it a happy day, but they're at each other's throats.
episodes.title: Everyone

episodes.synopsis: The gang is on holiday in Morocco. The villa may be a wreck, but they've found a load of weed under the floorboards so they don't care.
episodes.title: Everyone

episodes.synopsis: Professor David Blood has banned Rich from visiting Grace in hospital and it's killing him. Alo tries to keep Rich out of trouble with band practice.
episodes.title: Rich

episodes.synopsis: It's Alex's first day at college, where he hits it off with a fellow student. But Alex isn't used to having friends, and it can't last.
episodes.title: Alex

episodes.synopsis: Franky is in a bad place, and in her isolation she feels drawn to Luke. He's bad news, but she feels as if he's the only person who understands her.
episodes.title: Franky

episodes.synopsis: Mini feels trapped: She's lost control of her life and needs to get away, so she seeks refuge in the arms of her dad.
episodes.title: Mini

episodes.synopsis: Torn between his love for Franky, his loyalty to Matty and his fear of confrontation, Nick's life begins to spin wildly out of control.
episodes.title: Nick

episodes.synopsis: Unaware that Mini is carrying his baby, Alo attempts to get over her by hooking up with a new girl, Poppy Champion.
episodes.title: Alo

episodes.synopsis: With nobody to turn to in her hour of need, Liv is forced to face up to the choices she's made and isn't quite as strong as she believed.
episodes.title: Liv

episodes.synopsis: Mini and Franky are still holed up in Mini's bedroom, but with Matty in Bristol and Mini's growing baby bump, time is running out for the girls.
episodes.title: Franky and Mini

episodes.synopsis: It's the end of an era. The exam results are in; everyone's future hangs in the balance and the group is still in pieces following Grace's death.
episodes.title: Everyone (Finale)

episodes.synopsis: Effy has a dead-end job as a receptionist, but she stumbles across crucial financial information and embarks on an affair with her wealthy boss.
episodes.title: Fire Part One

episodes.synopsis: Effy has a dead-end job as a receptionist, but she stumbles across crucial financial information and embarks on an affair with her wealthy boss.
episodes.title: Fire Part Two

episodes.synopsis: Cassie is adrift, alone and invisible in London. Slowly, she realizes that someone is following her. Cassie turns towards the unknown.
episodes.title: Pure Part One

episodes.synopsis: Cassie is adrift, alone and invisible, trying to make sense of her life. When she realizes someone is following her, she turns towards the unknown.
episodes.title: Pure Part Two

episodes.synopsis: Cook has a job delivering drugs, and when he's asked to help his employer's girlfriend find a house, he finds that he's irresistibly attracted to her.
episodes.title: Rise Part One

episodes.synopsis: Cook has a job delivering drugs, but when he is asked to help his employer's girlfriend find a house, he becomes irresistibly attracted to her.
episodes.title: Rise Part Two
